span.a: Click Here for New COVID-19 Information

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Important Announcement

p.span: Please click on the picture above to open the Kindergarten Pre-Registration Enrollment Form. You can print this file and complete it to be turned in at a later date.

a.title: Go to comments for LCSD Kindergarten Pre-Registration

span.p: REMINDER! COMPLETE YOUR CENSUS! All families are encouraged to complete their Census questionnaire. This is a great time for families to complete the Census, especially since many parents are home with their children. Families may respond online at www.my2020census.gov, by calling the toll-free number, 1-844-330-2020, or by mailing back the questionnaire they receive in the mail. The toll-free number is in 12 different languages.

hr.p: A current list of employment opportunities for Lawrence County School District may be found on our Human Resources Page under Vacancies.

a.title: Go to comments for Employment Opportunities Listed
